title: Can Wukong get a new skin?
body:
It's been a while since Wu has gotten a new skin and I would really like one, he is played decently often and lots of other champs who are played not as much as him have gotten skins. Pls Rito pls...


{{champion:62}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:62}}

replies.body:
{{champion:420}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:136}} {{champion:163}} 
It's been too long for these guys, while Wu kinda just got Radiant. He also had some pretty cool skins already.

> [{quoted}](name=Wolfinator,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=EAEr8EoY,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-22T07:10:37.388+0000)
>
> {{champion:420}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:136}} {{champion:163}} 
> It's been too long for these guys, while Wu kinda just got Radiant. He also had some pretty cool skins already.

{{champion:112}}  hasn't gotten one since I've started playing LoL.
I mean, Radient was January 2016, almost a year and half ago, and Taliyah came out after that, and Sol And Illaoi legit came out like 2 months before that.
Wu prolly wont see any skin love for a while, he already has a lengthy selection to choose from.

Yes I would like to see more Wukong skins but Yorick needs skins before anyone else.
He has the 2 he started with back when he debuted.
